Title: The Wall Between Us
Description:
I know this fight was not ours, $n. But I thank you for your assistance. It was with the Alliance's assistance that Lordaeron was cleansed and the favor has now been returned.

I do not think I can hope for peace. Instead, I will hope that these efforts have led to at least an understanding of the plights of both Gilneans and the Forsaken.

Let us meet with Lilian in Pyrewood Village. This celebration is not for us.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Lilian and Calia in Pyrewood Village.
